summary: How was it possible that a movie like Vampiros del espacio (1957) could be made? This documentary about Edward D. Wood Jr.'s masterpiece gives the answer.
cast: Maila Nurmi|Dolores Fuller|Paul Marco|Conrad Brooks|Loretta King|Lynn Lemon|Bela Lugosi|Bela Lugosi Jr.|Norma McCarty|Michael McCarthy|Mona McKinnon|Joseph F. Robertson|Lyle Talbot|Harry Thomas|Crawford John Thomas|Gregory Walcott|David Ward|Edward D. Wood Jr.|Kent Adamson|Tomi Griffin|Ann Robinson
title: The Haunted World of Edward D. Wood Jr.
